overview: Lily, a stunning photograph model, suddenly notices that hair is growing on her face and escalating to a real "man's beard". Her lover, Richard, who has just returned from a prolonged business trip cannot help her. On the contrary, she is so exasperated that she runs away into the night of the big city where she has her first experiences as a "man".
tagline: Experimental and symbolic woman's film which calls for the union of masculine and feminine traits in mankind
title: Die Nachtmeerfahrt
